pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion.
pre_caption: The video begins with a view of a dense forest, featuring tall trees with thick trunks and a forest floor covered in moss and rocks. As the camera moves forward, the trees and rocks remain in view, with the sunlight filtering through the canopy, creating a serene and lush environment. The camera continues to glide smoothly through the forest, revealing more of the dense foliage and the natural landscape. The movement of the camera provides a continuous view of the forest, highlighting the tranquility and beauty of the natural setting.
